text: Saltlake Shiksha Niketan is a private co-ed school located in Kolkata, West Bengal.https://beeindia.gov.in/sites/default/files/WB%202015.pdf ==About School== It was established in 2005. The school operates under the Central Board of Secondary Education. It is situated at Mahisbathan, Saltlake, Kolkata. Mrs. Usha Subba was working as the principal of the School till June 2019 .As of 2019 nupur datta is appointed as vice principal and rekha vaisya as academic director by management. Apart from the regular facilities, the school also conducts Bhagwat Geeta classes for the students. ==See also== *Education in India *List of schools in India *Education in West Bengal ==References== ==External links== Category:Primary schools in West Bengal Category:High schools and secondary schools in Kolkata Category:Private schools in Kolkata Category:Educational institutions established in 2005 Category:2005 establishments in India
title: Saltlake Shiksha Niketan
